buginformation.summary: new multivariate vector optimizers cannot used with large number weights
buginformation.description: when using the weigth class pass large number weights multivariate vector optimizers nxn full matrix created and copied when elements vector used this exhausts memory when large this happens for example when using curve fitters even simple curve fitters like polynomial ones for low degree with large number points encountered this with curve fitting 41200 points which created matrix with billion elements
